concept.title: What does Blockchain do?
concept.shortdesc: Overview about the functions of blockchain in the economy and Internet of the future.

conbody.p: Blockchain technology has two primary functions that serve essential purposes for the future economy and the future Internet:

This paper addresses the vision of where we can be and follow up with the design and reasoning behind the architecture needed on top of the blockchain. We explain TokenScript which is a critical missing layer and go over its design principles and how we are building it.
